title: League opens then closes?
body:
Basically my league opens then closes, it wont even allow me to get to the point of logging in
it shows on my task manager then closes
ive used hextech repair tool no luck
ive made sure its added to my firewall exceptions
no anitviruses are blocking it
and ive unsintalled and reinststalled
i was just playing yesterday im not sure whats the issue???

replies.body: Heya, are you on a mac or PC?  The issue here may be dependent on that.  If you're on a PC and the client is coming up at all then you could have a security setting blocking it.  Firewall and antivirus checks are good so you're on the right  track!  What about running As Administrator?  Try the other steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide as well to see if that helps.

Hey so im replying here to help other people since this is apparently a common issue for both mac and windows users. I am on windows and performed reinstallation using the hextech tool which diddnt do anything so i then did a "Clean boot" as riot said to do here https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#wq7 along with restarting my pc after and it started working :)
I have the same issue when I switch my client to NA from EUW.Works fine on EUW,but not on NA.
